comments: Advisory services for the New Bridge for the St. Lawrence Corridor Project. This contract includes amendments in the amount of $686,432.95 in July 2014, bringing the total value of the contract to $4,795,735.03. The original contract was awarded by Transport Canada on July 25, 2012, and transferred to Infrastructure Canada in 2014, when responsibility for the New Bridge for the St. Lawrence Corridor Project was transferred to Infrastructure Canada. This contract is a call-up against a Public Works and Government Services Canada procurement tool.
